price: àwọn ipò kan àti àforíjìn àti àánú láti ọ̀dọ̀ Rẹ̀. Allāhu sì ń jẹ́ Aláforíjìn Àṣàkẹ́-ọ̀run.
arabic: دَرَجَٰتٖ مِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَةٗ وَرَحۡمَةٗۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: darajātin min'hu wamaghfiratan waraḥmatan wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
